definitions.definition: To touch with the lips or press the lips against, usually to show love or affection or passion , or as part of a greeting .
To (cause to) touch lightly or slightly ; to come into contact.
examples: The nearside of the car just kissed a parked truck as he took the corner at high speed.
His ball kissed the black into the corner pocket.

definitions.definition: Of two or more people, to touch each other's lips together , usually to express love or affection or passion.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To touch with the lips or press the lips against, usually to show love or affection or passion , or as part of a greeting .
secondary_definitions: ( ambitransitive ) To (cause to) touch lightly or slightly ; to come into contact.
( reciprocal ) Of two or more people, to touch each other's lips together , usually to express love or affection or passion.
( transitive , archaic ) To treat with fondness .
